basics.name: Brandon Dao
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer with a particular interest in making things simple and automating daily tasks. I try to keep up with security and best practices, and am always looking for new things to learn.

work.summary: I am working with clients to fulfill their business needs and requirements by building out great user experiences.
I worked mainly on the agent servicing platform, building out user experiences as well as backends powering critical workflows.
highlights: Built microservices in Java with Spring Boot that listen to RabbitMQ queues and Kafka topics to handle real-time processes
Developed web applications using Node.js to build APIs that present data to a front ends powered by Angular and Vue
Contributed to inner source projects while collaborating with Agile team to deliver main intent

work.summary: I partook in a ten week training program that brought me up to speed with the tools and frameworks that companies use on a day-to-day basis.
highlights: Learned and practiced industry standards in a classroom environment
Developed multiple small practice projects with an Agile team using a modern tech stack including Java, Spring, jQuery, Jenkins, AWS, and GitLab to build and deploy
